summary: A collection of expertly photographed phenomena with no conventional plot. The footage focuses on nature, humanity and the relationship between them.
cast: Edward Asner|Pat Benatar|Jerry Brown|Johnny Carson|Dick Cavett|Marilyn Chambers|Sammy Davis Jr.|Lou Dobbs|Thomas Dolby|Linda Ellerbee|Jerry Falwell|Mark J. Goodman|Ted Koppel|Peter Sellers|Bill Tush
title: Koyaanisqatsi
